Apple___Apple_scab: Fungicides such as copper-based fungicides, sulfur, or systemic fungicides. Remove infected leaves in spring.
Apple___Black_rot: Remove and destroy infected fruit and leaves, apply fungicides, and ensure proper air circulation around the trees.
Apple___Cedar_apple_rust: Use resistant apple varieties, remove infected plant material, and apply fungicides like myclobutanil or sulfur.
Blueberry___healthy: Maintain good plant hygiene, ensure proper irrigation and nutrient management.
Cherry_(including_sour)___Powdery_mildew: Apply fungicides such as neem oil, sulfur, or potassium bicarbonate, and prune infected parts.
Cherry_(including_sour)___healthy: Regular care, proper spacing to improve airflow.
Corn_(maize)___Cercospora_leaf_spot Gray: Apply fungicides such as chlorothalonil or pyraclostrobin, rotate crops to prevent recurrence.
Corn_(maize)___Common_rust_: Apply fungicides like azoxystrobin or chlorothalonil, rotate crops.
Corn_(maize)___Northern_Leaf_Blight: Apply fungicides like propiconazole, rotate crops, and remove infected plant debris.
Corn_(maize)___healthy: Proper irrigation, nitrogen management, and pest control.
Grape___Black_rot: Apply copper-based fungicides or systemic fungicides, remove and dispose of infected fruit and leaves.
Grape___Esca_(Black_Measles): There’s no cure; remove infected vines and avoid injuries to the vine.
Grape___Leaf_blight_(Isariopsis_Leaf_Spo: Apply fungicides like sulfur or copper, ensure proper pruning and air circulation.
Grape___healthy: Proper trellising, pest control, and monitoring for diseases.
Orange___Haunglongbing_(Citrus_greening): No cure; remove infected trees to prevent spread, maintain healthy soil, and use systemic insecticides to control vector insects (Asian citrus psyllid).
Peach___Bacterial_spot: Apply copper-based fungicides or streptomycin for bacterial control, remove infected fruit and leaves, and practice good sanitation.
Peach___healthy: Regular maintenance, proper irrigation, and pruning.
Pepper,_bell___Bacterial_spot: Use copper-based fungicides, ensure proper spacing and sanitation.
Pepper,_bell___healthy: Use resistant varieties and ensure optimal growing conditions.
Potato___Early_blight: Apply fungicides like chlorothalonil, rotate crops, and ensure proper spacing for air circulation.
Potato___Late_blight: Use fungicides like metalaxyl or chlorothalonil, remove infected plants immediately, and practice crop rotation.
Potato___healthy: Regular care, pest management, and ensure well-drained soil.
Raspberry___healthy: Keep the plants clean, prune regularly, and ensure proper water and nutrient levels.
Soybean___healthy: Keep the fields free from weeds, manage soil nutrients properly, and monitor for pests.
Squash___Powdery_mildew: Apply fungicides like sulfur, neem oil, or potassium bicarbonate. Remove infected leaves and improve airflow.
Strawberry___Leaf_scorch: Ensure proper watering, mulching, and pest control.
Strawberry___healthy: Apply fungicides like sulfur or copper, prune affected parts, and ensure proper watering practices.
Tomato___Bacterial_spot: Regular care, optimal sun exposure, and pest control.
Tomato___Early_blight: Apply copper-based fungicides, prune infected leaves, and practice good sanitation.
Tomato___Late_blight: Use fungicides such as chlorothalonil or copper, ensure proper spacing, and rotate crops.
Tomato___Leaf_Mold: Apply fungicides like mancozeb or chlorothalonil, and remove infected plant material.
Tomato___Septoria_leaf_spot: Apply fungicides like chlorothalonil, and ensure proper airflow.
Tomato___Spider_mites Two-spotted_spider: Use fungicides like chlorothalonil or mancozeb, remove infected leaves, and avoid overhead irrigation.
Tomato___Target_Spot: Apply insecticidal soap or neem oil, keep plants well-watered, and introduce natural predators.
Tomato___Tomato_Yellow_Leaf_Curl_Virus: Use fungicides like chlorothalonil or copper, and rotate crops.
Tomato___Tomato_mosaic_virus: Remove infected plants, control whiteflies (the virus vector) with insecticides or by using reflective mulches.
Tomato___healthy: Remove and destroy infected plants, prevent transmission by controlling aphids.
